title: Hour 3 - Adam Sandler (04-13-20)
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Adam Sandler (04-13-20)
description:
Adam Sandler talks about being quarantined in his big house. Dan says we like football but good football; then he talks about other football leagues that have failed and why.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
